title: 3D Printed Ward
body: A friend of mine made me a 3D printed ward (that even glows in the dark)!

replies.body:
I SO WANT THIS

I'LL PUT THEM ALL OVER MY LAWN AND WHEN PEOPLE SHOW UP I'LL BE LIKE

"STAY OUTTA MAH JUNGLE"
This is going to be our generation's version of 'get off my lawn." :D
People walk by my lawn wondering why I would ever put a funny looking lamp thing inside a bush...
Hahaha, sure beats lawn flamingos, imo.
Put somewhere in a bush just in case. You don't wanna find {{champion:86}} Garen looking at you right?
Can you imagine like, walking to your front door, and Garen pops out spinning, all 'cause you forget to put a ward down before you left.
Garen yelling DEMACIA!!! is worse. Especially putting a bush next to your bed or the fridge during the night.
Things that nightmares are made of. It's like that game, Don't Wake Daddy. O__O

Has science gone to far?

No.

In fact, it needs to go further.
You know what to do.
This image is amazing.
Why does only the top glow in the dark?
I didn't want the whole thing to glow, just personal preference! :D
These should be mass produced and sold. Rito please!
These and Plush Poros
that is cool
I wish I could use these for Halloween decorations! =O
Pretty sweet!
The magic of 3D printing technology! :D
fricken sweet
Yes prease
New ward skin confirmed?
Shut up and take my RP
